content.text: What are some effective growth hacking strategies for a new mobile app?
Implement a referral program, optimize your app store listing (ASO), run targeted social media campaigns, and partner with relevant influencers. Have you tried incentivizing reviews?
How do we use A/B testing to improve our website conversion rates?

Test one element at a time, track your results carefully, and analyze the data to identify winning variations. Focus on elements that have the biggest impact on conversion, like headlines and calls to action. What tools are you using?
